name: Sree Lakshmi Jabbi Reddy Charitable Trust
briefDescription: Trust registered by  a group of egalitarian medical professionals with a mission and mandate of empowering the communities living at periphery, in the areas of health. It began it is work during the year 2004 and itâ€™s health out reach interventions have currently spread over to 22 districts and reached around 4,57,000 rural poor forming part of Andhra Pradesh.
